narrative:
This was the first pre-license inspection of this applicant.  There were not any non-compliant items identified during
this inspection.  This applicant is ready for a USDA Class "C" license and will send the license fee directly to the
Eastern Regional Office.
USDA/APHIS/Animal Care
920 Main Campus Drive
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
No USDA regulated activity may be conducted until the license has been issued. 
 
An exit briefing was conducted with a facility representative.
